text: Table 14-3. Select Methods of the Process Type Method Meaning in Life CloseMainWindow() This method closes a process that has a user interface by sending a close message to its main window. GetCurrentProcess() This static method returns a new Process object that represents the currently active process. GetProcesses() This static method returns an array of new Process objects running on a given machine. Kill() This method immediately stops the associated process. Start() This method starts a process.
